branchItem.description: <p>Series LVQ is a 3 port chemical valve with a non-metallic exterior.  A high density PVDF housing offers increased chemical resistance and the special diaphragm construction insures gentle opening and closing preventing the formation of micro-bubbles.  The LVQ guide ring eliminates lateral motion of the poppet, which reduces internal leakage.</p>
